alert.note: Alert for Logan; Scott (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 11 at 8:07PM CST until January 11 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Logan County in western Arkansas... Northwestern Scott County in western Arkansas... * Until 900 PM CST. * At 807 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Wister State Park, or 13 miles south of Poteau, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Waldron... Mansfield... Oliver... Echo... Morgan Springs... Bates... Cauthron... Winfield... Hon... Lucas... Liberty... Ione... Elm Park... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
